RJ, why don't you go over to Franks house and let us all know what he is  
=
eating for his breakfast?  See...asking a spirit is doing the same  
thing.=
..they are only people too.  :) sf
 
 
In a message dated 8/22/2010 11:09:5=
4 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
rasterer@... writes:

 
 
 
No proble=
m Snowfire.  Since I don't believe (at  least not yet) the same 
things as =
everyone here, it just saves time if I  assume anything that looks 
like an=
 argument is directed at me.  ;)

ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC]  Scamp,

ust 22,  2010, 7:56 AM

my Scamp bark  to the list 
in general, did not direct it to you, sorry.  s=
f
 
 
In a message dated 8/22/2010 9:20:39 A.M. Eastern Standard  Time, 
ra=
sterer@... writes:

 

Experimental data in controlled conditions,  a=
nd personal anecdotes, are 
not the same thing,


---  On Sun, 8/22/10, Fra=
nk Sumption  <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


From:  Frank Sumption <pu=
rplealiengirl@...>
Subject:  Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com
Date:  Sunday, August 22, 2010, 12:21 AM


 
If you completely ign=
ore what everyone else in  the whole wide freaking 
world gets via EVP, var=
ious  photography and ITC methods, and just chance 
encounters,  then yeah,=
 you probably don't have any data, and won't have  any 
data no matter what=
. 
 
F-S


On Sat, Aug  21, 2010 at 3:42 PM, Rick Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@yaho=
o.com> 
wrote:

 
 
 
 
 
Hey RJ,I think we need to go to the cemetary and =
see  what you get there....


 
____________________________________
 From:=
 Rj  <rasterer@...>  

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

Sent: Sat, August=
 21,  2010 2:29:36 PM  

Subject: Re:  [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



I don't think I =
have enough data yet  to make any conclusions, so I plan 
more  experiments=
.  Since there are different  distinct claims about what the 
box or the re=
corders  can do, I try to make different distinct experiments  
for each.

=
Some people claim they can get the  box to tell them things that the 
opera=
tor couldn't  know, so my "whats the object" experiment is one way  to 
exa=
mine that.  Some people claim the boxes  can make predictions, so catalogin=
g 
predictions and  examining the results can help examine that.   If there=
 are 
other claims, I will try to figure  experiments based on those.

--- =
On Sat,  8/21/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>  wrote:


From=
:  Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject:  Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp=
,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date:  Saturday, August 21, 2010, 12:48 PM


=
 
I get our last dogs from time to time,  and used to get them via white 
n=
oise when I  first started this. Last summer some kids came  down into the =

basement wiht the younger grandson,  and the little yorkie barked, but "ge=
t 
outta here"  came out, some how. 
 
 Yeah, I think I was too hard on RJ.=
 I  don't know why, but testing doens't 
seem to work,  but we get enough t=
o prove this to ourselves. It's  probably 
a faith thing, although I'm not =
 religious, even anti-religion.  
 
 F-S
 



On Fri, Aug 20, 2010 at 6:27 =
PM, <SnowfireL@...>  wrote:

 
 
 
[_Attachment(s)_ 
(https://mail.goog=
le.com/mail/?ui=3D2&view=3Djs&name=3Dmain,tlist&ver=3D9oD1J7yvz5o.en.&am=3D=
!xONyw1plirqxhZ4a1PIWg1xlTveuJ8oWIzqJ6mz0Dt83ht4Zrp4

TopText)   from SnowfireL@...  included below]  
Here is a short file, =
where someone says,  "Scamp, Scamp," then Scamp 
barks. "yap."   This littl=
e dog belonged to my grandma, when I  was about 9 or 10 
years old, he was =
a Manchester  Terrier, and lived with us for many years, 
and  this is his =
bark for sure.  I'd know that  bark anywhere.  Sorry, that 
I can't make it=
  any clearer, I need to get one of those better  ghost boxes 
I guess.  RJ=
, spirits are  just like us, they are not omnipresent like  
God,  probably=
 why David doesn't want  to play the guessing game, he has better 
things  =
to do over there, and has said, they have  thousands of people 
standing in=
 this long line  waiting to get into the Heavens, and He can't  just 
drop =
His job and go to your house to see  what you have over there, He did 
tell=
 me that  first time what it was, and i sent it to you,  but it was too 
la=
te.  It's hard for me to  understand them sometimes, He was also right  
ab=
out that little boy, Syler being killed, and  where his body would be found=
, 
I don't know what  they did about it though. sf
























=
